module_restrictions: Students are reminded to review the online course list carefully as it contains important information which is often ignored.
visa_info: All students should legalize their stay exceeding 3 months by obtaining temporary residence permit after their arrival to Poland with the help from WUT.
accommodations_info: WUT dormitories are located outside the campus but not very far. Most rooms are usually double or triple sharing. University accommodation is not guaranteed.
university_description: Warsaw University of Technology is a public polytechnic founded in 1826.
location_cost_of_living: Living expenses in Poland are lower as compared to many other European countries.
location_description: Warsaw is the capital and largest city of Poland.
location_halal: Halal food options are available in the city.
location_vegetarian: Vegetarian food options are available in the city.
